content:
# The Stone Furnace is now operational and in the "WORKING" status, indicating that it is actively smelting the iron ore. It has consumed some coal as fuel and is processing the iron ore.

# I will wait for the smelting process to complete and check how many iron plates are produced. 

# Let's monitor the furnace for a short duration to see if it produces the iron plates.

for _ in range(30):  # Wait for a maximum of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 1:  # Check if at least one iron plate has been produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, let's check the inventory of the furnace and the overall inventory again.
print(f"Final inventory of the furnace: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check the final inventory of the furnace
print(f"Final player inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the final player inventory
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the status of entities on the map again
